content: this legal text is about a labor court appeal in ghent it involves an exspouse who is responsible for repaying the mortgage on their joint home the housing provision must be charged as an integration income benefit even though the final burden is set in the division of matrimonial property the parties involved are identified as yw and mwjd the case is between ocmw ghent and ee the main issues discussed are integration income means of subsistence advantage of the neighborhood joint residence of spouses and repayment the appellant argues that the exspouse should be responsible for the housing costs including mortgage repayments the court of appeal considers relevant provisions and interpretative circulars the appellant determines that the integration income benefit should be €21320 which is half of the monthly mortgage repayments
